entry.title: hello-world
entry.content:
Interesting to think we’ve been iterating through this new world order since late March 2020. It’s now late October 2020 and it feels far longer than the 7 or so calendar months. We’ve gone through toilet paper shortages and home confinement, and now experience life in very different ways. We are blessed with 5 active children who minimize the isolation of this time, and maximize the need to still experience life; we’ve refined our skills at skateboarding, surfing, biking, bodyboarding, etc and rank Summer 2020 pretty high.

We are less than a week away from the next election and one can only hope our nation has enough sense to see though the lies and misdirection to elect a transitional figure, who will help the nation address this pandemic and begin to heal.

Beyond politics, we need a more communal approach to life. We’re working on being creative about how we can help others during these interesting times. One area I’m familar with is online marketing for small/medium online retailers. This is where I’d like to focus some of my extra energy and skills. Over the last decade I’ve built software to market retail products through the top marketing channels. This is my kickoff to expand a side project, roicontrast.com, which will provide tools for merchants looking to expand their marketing reach.
